dict.acceptation: 退休，退职；引退，隐居；退隐处；

sent.orig: The main factors of early retirement decision were personal reason and retirement system reason.
sent.trans: 提早退休决定最主要的是[个人因素]，其次是[退休制度因素]。

sent.orig: Organizations may offer early retirement to those employees nearing the statutory retirement age.
sent.trans: 企事业单位也许会给这些临近退休年龄人提供提前退休的机会。

sent.orig: For more than thirty years, Americans have used individual retirement accounts, or, to increase retirement savings.
sent.trans: 三十多年前，美国人就实行了个人退休帐户来增加退休金。

sent.orig: Mr Simpson, have you planned for your retirement?
sent.trans: 森信先生，您有否为您退休后的生活打算？

sent.orig: The banker advised Mr. Shu to invest in some stocks for his retirement.
sent.trans: 银行业者建议舒先生为他的退休生活投资一些股票。
